lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay Buccaneers running back Doug Martin has been suspended four games for violating the NFL's performance-enhancing drug policy and said on Wednesday he was entering a treatment facility.

headline.print_headline: Bucs' RB Martin Suspended Four Games for Doping Violation
headline.main: Bucs' RB Martin Suspended Four Games for Doping Violation
